description: Wind farms are part of the government's plans to achieve net-zero carbon emissions by 2050.
title: Isle of Man commits to 75% renewable electricity by 2035
title_page: Isle of Man commits to 75% renewable electricity by 2035 - BBC News
maintext: Mr Quayle said everyone should take responsibility for their carbon footprint. "Working with the private sector and all of the people of the Isle of Man we can ensure that our children have a future," he added.
